response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This unique item is worth $1,200,000 to you, and I am excited to extend this exclusive offer to you at a special price of $950,000. I believe this is a fair and advantageous proposition, considering its worth and the benefits it can bring to you. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you have any questions about the product. I am here to assist you every step of the way.", "product_price": 950000}
